trans-unit.source: The source of the event, typically a data container or data-bound collection.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento, normalmente um contêiner de dados ou uma coleção associada a dados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingsSaving" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de <see cref="E:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingsSaving" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingsSaving> event occurs just before a group of application settings are persisted, typically during the execution of the <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A> method of a wrapper class derived from <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingsSaving> evento ocorre somente antes de um grupo de configurações de aplicativo são mantidas, geralmente durante a execução do <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A> derivado do método de uma classe wrapper <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>.
